product_name: Casio ProTrek Triple Sensor Digital Watch - Men's
long_description: The ProTrek Triple Sensor watch shrugs off water and extreme cold, providing easy, one-touch access to a remarkably precise compass, thermometer and altimeter, even while wearing gloves.
short_description: The ProTrek Triple Sensor watch shrugs off water and extreme cold, providing easy, one-touch access to a remarkably precise compass, thermometer and altimeter, even while wearing gloves.
